effect.scarlet_violet: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power. Changes nature power to thunderbolt.
effect.the_teal_mask: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power. Changes nature power to thunderbolt.
effect.the_indigo_disk: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power. Changes nature power to thunderbolt.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground can no longer fall asleep.
